tasks.help: Gets the version information for a project.
Executes OctoVersion information for a project, without trying to parse the output.

octoVersionSettings.name: CurrentBranch
octoVersionSettings.help: Pass in the name of the branch. If not set, OctoVersion will attempt to derive it, but this may lead to incorrect values.

octoVersionSettings.name: NonPreReleaseTags
octoVersionSettings.help: Names of branches that will not get a pre-release suffix. Defaults to 'main' (with legacy support for 'master').

octoVersionSettings.name: RepositoryPath
octoVersionSettings.help: Path to the Git repository. If not set, assumes that the current working folder is the root of the repository

octoVersionSettings.name: Major
octoVersionSettings.help: Override the calculated Major with a specific value.

octoVersionSettings.name: Minor
octoVersionSettings.help: Override the calculated Minor with a specific value.

octoVersionSettings.name: Patch
octoVersionSettings.help: Override the calculated Patch with a specific value.

octoVersionSettings.name: PreReleaseTag
octoVersionSettings.help: Override the calculated PreReleaseTag with a specific value.

octoVersionSettings.name: BuildMetadata
octoVersionSettings.help: Override the calculated build metadata with a specific value.

octoVersionSettings.name: FullSemVer
octoVersionSettings.help: If set, this version number will override all of the other values and OctoVersion will just adopt it wholesale.

octoVersionSettings.name: OutputFormats
octoVersionSettings.help: How to format the output. Defaults to Console.

octoVersionSettings.name: DetectEnvironment
octoVersionSettings.help: Detect the output format from the runtime environment (usually the CI environment).

octoVersionSettings.name: OutputJsonFile
octoVersionSettings.help: Emit json to the specified file. Ensure that either the `JsonFile` output formatter is added, or that `DetectEnvironment` is `true`.
